comments:
I20040219

1. create a fresh workspace
2. checkout a project that has a class with warnings
3. build and get warnings in Problems view
4. double click on warning in problems view
5. observe stack trace

The issue may be that because it's a fresh perspective and there
are no editors yet, there is no editor group for the contributed
item (I don't know what's contributed, but the trace illudes to 
this).
